description.default: Advanced markdown renderer for SharePoint with Mermaid diagrams, math equations, and more

properties.markdownContent:
[[TOC]]
# Welcome to Better Markdown

Start editing to see the magic! âœ¨

## Features

- **Styled blockquotes** with info, warning, danger, and success variants
- **Mermaid diagrams** for flowcharts and visualizations
- **Math rendering** with KaTeX ($E=mc^2$)
- **Table of contents** generation
- **Syntax highlighting** for code blocks
- **Footnotes** support
- **Custom list styles** (grid and links)

## Quick Examples

### Information Blockquote
> This is important information!
{.is-info}

## Tables
With support for colspan, rowspan and cell alignment
| Header 1 | Header 2 | Header 3 |
|----------|:--------:|----------|
| Content  | Spans two columns  ||
| ^^       | Cell 3   | Cell 4   |
| Normal   | Cell     | Content  |

### Code Block
```javascript
function hello() {
  console.log('Hello, Better Markdown!');
}
```

### Simple Diagram
```mermaid
graph LR
  A[Start] --> B[Process]
  B --> C[End]
```

Edit this web part's properties to customize!
